content: Travis County's property tax rate for 2023 is 0.318239 per $100 of assessed value. This rate includes general fund operations and debt service.
Property taxes in Travis County are assessed annually. The tax year runs from January 1 to December 31, with payments due by January 31 of the following year.
Travis County offers various property tax exemptions, including homestead exemptions for primary residences and exemptions for seniors over 65 years old.
